name: places/ChIJW9AptA5ZwokRNQ3QVNbGVbk
formattedAddress: 340 E 29th St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 340 E 29th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
There’s no frills at Berkley Place but building is efficient and most importantly exceptionally clean and comfortable. The hot water takes a while to kick in and can be a bit of an inconvenience when you’re in a rush to shower and run out. The staffs are great especially Michael and Cameka they are gems.

The only thing that left a bad taste in my mouth is the broker the management chose. City Wide took over 13k in brokers fee and screwed up my application which resulted in them hounding me weeks after I thought things were signed and ready. Not only that but at 13k they refuse to even send me an envelope to deliver their mess up. It’s like you’re paying them to work for them. Their broker had the nastiest attitude.
